text: The Citroën Evasion was a large MPV produced by Citroën between 1994 and 2002. It is similar to the Fiat Ulysse, Lancia Zeta and Peugeot 806. == Engines == * 1.8i 73 kW (99 hp) * 2.0i 89 kW (121 hp) * 2.0i 16V 97 kW (132 hp) and 100 kW (136 hp) * 2.0i Turbo CT 108 kW (147 hp) * 1.9 Turbo D 66 kW (90 hp) * 2.0 HDi 80 kW (109 hp) * 2.1 Turbo D12 80 kW (109 hp) Evasion Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Citroën Evasion
